title: FOURTH WING
author: Rebecca Yarros
description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.

title: IRON FLAME
author: Rebecca Yarros
description: The second book in the Empyrean series. Violet Sorrengail’s next round of training might require her to betray the man she loves.

title: THE HEAVEN & EARTH GROCERY STORE
author: James McBride
description: Secrets held by the residents of a dilapidated neighborhood come to life when a skeleton is found at the bottom of a well.

title: ICEBREAKER
author: Hannah Grace
description: Anastasia might need the help of the captain of a college hockey team to get on the Olympic figure skating team.

title: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY
author: Bonnie Garmus
description: A scientist and single mother living in California in the 1960s becomes a star on a TV cooking show.

title: THE HOUSEMAID
author: Freida McFadden
description: Troubles surface when a woman looking to make a fresh start takes a job in the home of the Winchesters.

title: THE EXCHANGE
author: John Grisham
description: In a sequel to “The Firm,” Mitch McDeere, who is now a partner at the world’s largest law firm, gets caught up in a sinister plot.

title: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.

title: TWISTED LOVE
author: Ana Huang
description: The first book in the Twisted series. Secrets emerge when Ava explores things with her brother’s best friend.

title: HOUSE OF EARTH AND BLOOD
author: Sarah J. Maas
description: Passion arises between Bryce Quinlan and Hunt Athalar as they seek to avenge the deaths of Bryce’s friends.

title: HELLO BEAUTIFUL
author: Ann Napolitano
description: In a homage to Louisa May Alcott’s “Little Women,” a young man’s dark past resurfaces as he gets to know the family of his college sweetheart.

title: WILDFIRE
author: Hannah Grace
description: The second book in the Maple Hills series. Two summer camp counselors who previously had a one-night stand may run afoul of the camp’s rules.

title: TOO LATE
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Dangers develop when a drug trafficker becomes obsessed with a woman who has a mutual attraction to a D.E.A. agent.

title: A COURT OF SILVER FLAMES
author: Sarah J. Maas
description: The fifth book in the Court of Thorns and Roses series. Nesta Archeron is forced into close quarters with a warrior named Cassian.

title: HOUSE OF SKY AND BREATH
author: Sarah J. Maas
description: The second book in the Crescent City series. Bryce Quinlan and Hunt Athalar must choose to fight or stay silent.
